description: Non-Hamiltonian 1-tough simplicial polyhedra with n nodes.
references: M. B. Dillencourt, Polyhedra of small orders and their Hamiltonian properties. Tech. Rep. 92-91, Info. and Comp. Sci. Dept., Univ. Calif. Irvine, 1992.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
